question: According to its nutritional info, a bag of cookies has 250 calories per serving. If a 100 grams bag has 5 servings, how many gramss can you eat if your daily calorie target is 2375 and you have already consumed 1125 calories?
answer:
If the total calorie target is 2375 and I have consumed 1125 calories then I have 2375-1125 = <<2375-1125=1250>>1250 calories left to eat
If each serving of cookies has 250 calories and I only have 1250 calories left to eat, then I can only eat 1250/250 of a serving = 5 of a serving
We also know that a 100 grams bag of cookies has 5 servings, hence each serving has 100 grams/5 = <<100/5=20>>20 gramss
If I can only eat 5 of a serving, then I can eat only 20 grams * 5 = 100 gramss
#### 100
